title: Raymundo Debuts Love Song For Fiancé + Eddie Was Parent Shamed + Lunchbox Gets 'Murder House' Trip Assignment
itunes:title: Raymundo Debuts Love Song For Fiancé + Eddie Was Parent Shamed + Lunchbox Gets 'Murder House' Trip Assignment
description:
Bobby plays the song Raymundo wrote for his fiancé about their love story. Raymundo says they're planning to use it as their first dance song this Saturday. Eddie talks about how he was parent shamed at a restaurant for giving his foster baby a phone at the table. Plus, we give Lunchbox his assignments for the 'Murder House' trip tonight..and then we send him off!

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
